article.description: — Josip Vrankic had 20 points as Santa Clara romped past Pacific 81-59 on Monday night.
article.headline: Vrankic scores 20 to lead Santa Clara past Pacific 81-59
article.linkText: Vrankic scores 20 to lead Santa Clara past Pacific 81-59
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- — Josip Vrankic had 20 points as Santa Clara romped past Pacific 81-59 on Monday night. Keshawn Justice had 16 points and 10 rebounds for Santa Clara (14-8, 4-3 West Coast Conference). Giordan Williams added 14 points. Carlos Stewart had 14 points. Jalen Williams, whose 19 points per game heading into the matchup led the Broncos, scored 8 points. He failed to make a shot from beyond the arc (0 of 4). Jeremiah Bailey had 19 points and seven rebounds for the Tigers (6-14, 1-5). Khaleb Wilson-Rouse added 19 points. Alphonso Anderson had seven rebounds. The Broncos improve to 2-0 against the Tigers on the season. Santa Clara defeated Pacific 84-70 on Jan. 12. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/hub/college-basketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
